itunes:title: Tom Segura (comedian)
itunes:author: Matt Farah & Zack Klapman
itunes:summary:
Tom Segura is a hilarious stand up comedian, podcaster, writer and director. He's also a die-hard car guy who has been testing every press car McLaren will throw at him, dailies a Renntech E63 AMG and has a seriously fast M2 Comp. His new special, "Ball Hog" is available on Netflix. 

Find his podcasts, "Your Mom's House" and "2 Bears, 1 cave" at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYIgiXwJck_Pb5Nj-wIrsqg

Get dates for his live shows here: https://tomsegura.com/
